course_name: Transformative Leadership Leading For The Future 1.0
positive_comments: I like the broad examples given from a diverse range of sectors including politics, technology and sports.
improvement_opportunities: Many of the examples are heavily skewed towards examples from male leadership and it would be great to  be able to be more diverse by providing more examples from women in leadership whether across politics, sports, technology and so on. Please see the uploaded screenshot as an example in which the only leadership example provided from a woman is "Serena Williams"
attachments: Screenshot for Transformative Leadership Course April 24.png

course_name: Transformative Leadership Leading For The Future 1.0
positive_comments: Some good examples of who are transformative leaders. It may also be useful to consider other everyday persons who have demonstrated a high level of Emotional Intelligence in achieving Transformative Leadership.
improvement_opportunities: As far as Elon Musk is concerned, I would not consider him a good example of Transformative Leadership with a high level of Emotional Intelligence. As a a matter of fact he is the exact opposite displaying a high IQ and relatively low EQ. I would encourage the authors to consider another example from the business world. Musk is not it.
